name: Alice
feedback_details: A good restaurant is like a vacation; it transports you, and it becomes a lot more than just about the food. All great deeds and all great thoughts

name: Bob
feedback_details: I had an amazing experience with this service. The product arrived earlier than expected and was exactly what I needed. .

name: Charlie
feedback_details: The product I received was of top-notch quality. It surpassed all my expectations. The product arrived earlier than expected and was exactly what I needed.!

name: David
feedback_details: The service provided was decent, but there's room for improvement. The delivery was a bit delayed, which affected my overall experience

name: Eva
feedback_details: Overall, my experience was positive. The product met my expectations, and the buying process was smooth. However, a little more variety in product options would be nice.

name: Frank
feedback_details: I encountered some issues with the delivery, which disappointed me. The delay affected my plans, and I was expecting a better service level.
